attributes.action: Disolve Parliament for a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am totally disgusted with the shambolic way MP's have carried out their business regarding personal expenses. We need a clean slate and start again with politicians who are ethical, moral and have the interests of this country as their main objective and not just out for their own personal gain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
